Name: sim4D ATC
About the game: SimATC is a simulation game with a professional ATC rule core, which requires players to have a certain basic knowledge of air traffic control and a relatively standard Mandarin accent (Only Chinese voices are currently supported, English version is coming soon). Through the voice interaction ability of AI captain, the VHF channel call scene simulation is available, so that players can participate in the role of apron/tower controller in the whole scene, and experience the most real apron/tower control process. Based on the voice interaction function, the latest 4D version upgrades the 2D field surveillance mode to the 3D real scene mode, providing a full-freedom first-person tower view, as well as a God mode airport sand table view.
